attributes.action: Saving the environments greenery and atmosphere, planting trees and plants instead of constructing more buildings
attributes.additional_details: using more Eco friendly methods, planting more trees to replace the ones being chopped down for resources, knocking down unnecessary buildings to replace with a garden or park of some sort filled with plants so that we have more greenery, reducing the impact car fumes have on our atmosphere so its more Eco friendly so we can save earth. At the moment we are destroying our environment and atmosphere, at this rate there will be no more greenery and global warming will get worse. Continuing this way will surely destroy the land we call home, so make a change now while we still have the chance.
